en.header: When trying to go for the close, you should never remain silent in front of a client. True or false?
en.klf: Build an agreement staircase, make your offer, then shut up. Let the customer speak first: silence can be used to put pressure on both parties. Use it.
en.tips: According to research conducted at the University of Groningen, people start feeling unsettled after about 4 seconds of silence. Use this knowledge next time you use the power of silence!

fr.header: Lorsque vous essayez de vous rapprocher, vous ne devez jamais rester silencieux devant un client. Vrai ou faux?
fr.klf: Construisez un escalier de concordance, faites votre offre, puis tais-toi. Laissez le client parler en premier: le silence peut être utilisé pour faire pression sur les deux parties. Utilise le.
fr.tips: Selon des recherches menées à l'Université de Groningue, les gens commencent à se sentir perturbés après environ 4 secondes de silence. Utilisez cette connaissance la prochaine fois que vous utiliserez le pouvoir du silence!

de.header: When trying to go for the close, you should never remain silent in front of a client. True or false?
de.klf: Build an agreement staircase, make your offer, then shut up. Let the customer speak first: silence can be used to put pressure on both parties. Use it.
de.tips: According to research conducted at the University of Groningen, people start feeling unsettled after about 4 seconds of silence. Use this knowledge next time you use the power of silence!
